title: chitha chOra
sahitya:
chorA chathurya leela gopala
govinda nanda sukumara navaneetha chorA (chita chora)

anupallavi

mArA kalaka nipuNa
vraja jana maNditha dAsOthsava (chatura chita chora)

caraNam

goparaja thanaya buvana mangaLa
kumudahita charaNa jAla
pApaharaNa dinakara manasija

vrishabhAnu nandini thadalola
neepatharuNi kara dharasAthirUda
nIratha kaNitha kanakasEla
santhApathimira kalakalmashanatha
parandhAmA paramabhaghavatha (chita chora)
